trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around October 14th 2011
Summary: While staring straight up in the dark sky I saw a very bright star show where there was none, just to disapear as fast as it appeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were intertaining my 4 year old grandson in the backyard laying on a couple of lounge chairs staring up into the dark sky. We told him to be watching for moving stars because those are Satellites. We saw a couple of satellites moving north to south, then we saw one moving diagonally from southwest to northeast. Haven't seen that before. As I stared straight up all of a sudden a very bright star appeared where there had not been one just to disapear in an instant. Like a Super Nova from a distant galaxy. I felt assume like I had just witnessed a Super Nova. My wife and grandson did not see it.
